website_summaries.verdict: Attractive and festive, these pajamas are sure to put the whole family in the holiday spirit whether lounging on snowy evenings or opening gifts Christmas morning.
pros: Comfortable cotton knit material isn't too warm or constrictive
Available in a wide range of sizes for kids and adults
cons: Sizes have a tendency to run somewhat small
Some wearers have questioned if they are 100% cotton, but the material still has a quality feel

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money and get a better pair else where
customer_reviews.text: This year I purchased Christmas PJs off amazon. I will not do this again. I may have saved a few dollars, but in the long run, not a great purchase. Sizes are different. Too long on my boys, too small on husband. The material is rough, not soft. My boys like to were them few months after Christmas, doubt this will happen. They both ( 10 and 11 years old) said they were too rough and fit funny.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this product to be bad quality with the price being quite low. I was very pleasantly surprised though! They’re just as good as carters or cat & jack ones from Target! I ordered them late on Christmas Eve eve and thought they would never make it to me before Christmas Eve! I was surprised again when they arrived in the early afternoon!! Absolutely excellent! My only regret is not ordering a pair for my husband and I... I will be doing next Christmas though!!
customer_reviews.author: EllieC

customer_reviews.title: Runs very tight and small
customer_reviews.text: Cute but runs very small, I order size 12 for my eight year old and she usually wears size 10 and I ordered size 4T for my 17 month old who usually wears 3T. Very high-waisted. Very tight in the neck. I noticed some of the design is cracking on my son's shirt. I only put it on for Christmas card photos and it's already cracking, didn't wash it yet. I believe it's little bit too expensive for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved them!!!
customer_reviews.text: We get Christmas pj’s each year for us and the grandkids. These were adorable and very comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kassso

customer_reviews.title: Thin material and runs small
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the material is extremely thin. Our place can get cold sometimes and this will not keep my daughter warm. My daughter is a size 8/10. I bought a size 10 (thinking it might be too big) but it is way smaller than expected. The pants and shirt fit her extremely tight. The pants fit her above her ankles. If you buy this product, I would suggest buying up a size or two.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cute pattern and good quality cloth unlike the normal Xmas Pj you get in store. This is my first time buying them online and I was very skeptical about it but I am glad I choose these. They are cheaper than store and much better quality. The set came on time and it looks awesome. I used it for Xmas pictures and now a night suit for all of us.
customer_reviews.author: Sheril S.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are great and we used them for Christmas. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: shimeka carter

customer_reviews.title: They run really small.
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute. But be warned, wash them seperatly, the red bleeds through big time. They also run really small. Had to send my daughter's back for a bigger size and I had already got her one size up with the original order. Mine fit well, but the cuffs on the pants are a little tight.
customer_reviews.author: Jeeper88

customer_reviews.title: Christmas pjs
customer_reviews.text: Fit all of us.. only had to Rebuy my son a size bigger.. I had gotten him size 12 and fit him to tight.. reordered and got him a size 14
customer_reviews.author: Isafdz

customer_reviews.title: not so good Christmas Pajamas..
customer_reviews.text: The top was a Small and the pants were a Large. They were in a plastic bag together so someone, somewhere made this error. The size was off...
customer_reviews.author: J.V.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, XL does not fit 46" chest
customer_reviews.text: I wear an XL in shirts 95% of the time, this one was tight. I will try a 2XL and let you know. Update -the 2XL fits as I expect an XL to fit. So you may want to go 1 size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run weird
customer_reviews.text: Not the regular fabric for jammies. Bought my daughter different sizes and neither of them fit her right. Had bought for Christmas family pictures but they didn’t work out.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan López

customer_reviews.title: Awesome... And they glow in the dark
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas are great. I bought four sets... One for each family member. All came as described. The sizing is right on. My kids realized that the words "Merry Christmas" on the front glow in the dark. We are a happy with what we got
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice pj set
customer_reviews.text: Nice pj set! My son is 7, I got one size larger for him and it fits great. With that, I think it might shrink a bit after washing, so maybe getting 2 sizes larger would have been a better idea. In all, pleasant material, bright colors and it’s super cute! Can’t wait to have our X-mas photos in matching pjs!
customer_reviews.author: isharp

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered daddy, mommy and my two year old granddaughter these pj's, and sent them as a surprise to their house. Everything fit as expected, and they ended up wearing them to the Christmas Eve party at their house. They looked adorable! We all were very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AOKAST

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Family Gift
customer_reviews.text: After searching the web for weeks; trying to find matching pajamas for my 5 nieces and nephew, I found these and can't wait to give them to the kids on Christmas!!! Very high quality and a great look for either girls or boys. So happy to have this one-stop shop option!
customer_reviews.author: Roddy Richard

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife , she is really happy with this pj. Pants was a little longer but she putted to wash in hot water and after length was perfect. She is using it for a month and colors are still the same , very bright and as showed in the picture. Want to buy for me too , to have matching one!
customer_reviews.author: TUDOR

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, color not a rich red, seems cheap
customer_reviews.text: The color on these was too bright, not a rich Xmas-y red like we wanted. The print on the shirt seemed cheap so we returned.
customer_reviews.author: Rhys

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Eve PJ Fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: The outfits were slightly smaller than what was expected. I would order 1 size larger. Great design and alot of fun for the family on Christmas Eve.
customer_reviews.author: L. Pittard

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure i thought i would have gotten three sets i only got one. I am disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon Beckford

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome gift for my family! Good quality, colors as shown, good fit, and excellent Christmas pictures. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size up and it was still skin tight. I’d order two sizes up. Quality of them is good, just run 2 sizes small.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M.

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: The men’s PJ’s were much bigger than expected and the women’s and kids smaller. Also quality wasn’t great compared to family Xmas PJ’s from Target for slightly less price.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Gilchrist

customer_reviews.title: Not frosty but nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute.I love anything snowmen,so these were perfect for me. They were comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Janice E. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: One wear pajamas
customer_reviews.text: Pretty pajamas but had many loose threads and holes appearing after one wearing. For price I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small, bad fabric
customer_reviews.text: I bought this larger than my kids size, and still runs too small. The fabric does not expand and was too tight on the arms. certainly not buying again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order 2 size larger.
customer_reviews.text: Don't go by the size listed,,they are at least 2 sizes smaller than listed,,I had to return them. Dud.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: got these for my husband and I for Christmas day, he loved it! Fit true to size
customer_reviews.author: Onceupon

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: These are cute but run small. I recommend ordering at least one or two sizes up.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Crappy material
customer_reviews.text: Material quality is terrible for the price of these. I returned immediately upon feeling them when they arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Howell

customer_reviews.title: Returned this item in same package as I sent back same pair of pjs in different size ..
customer_reviews.text: Too small ...both pairs ordered too small...sent back in one package
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette sanseverino

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Pajamas
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in two days as stated. Best features are the comfort and breathable material. Fit perfect. I ordered a larger size because I’m tall. The pants length was great.
customer_reviews.author: ProudWife1

customer_reviews.title: Fun an Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great product and was fun for our family. One of the adult sleeves became unsewn during the first time wear. Fabric is thin. Priced right for a one time holiday picture event! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy S Brekke

customer_reviews.title: Very very small
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Very small. Order 1 or even 2 sizes larger
customer_reviews.author: Michelle T

customer_reviews.title: Leggings!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these for myself and my boyfriend. I got a men's XS and they fit great! They had run out of Women's medium (my typical size). My boyfriend did not feel comfortable in them as they were leggings and quite tight.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good material/size runs small for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Nice material and fun family PJs. The boys size 10 years is more like size 8. Too small for my kiddo who normally wears size 10. Women’s small PJs were really a women’s small.
customer_reviews.author: Egenhoff

customer_reviews.title: Cute Pjs- a little snug
customer_reviews.text: My kids looked cute in their matching PJs but they were a litte snug and they probably won't last the winter.
customer_reviews.author: JChet

customer_reviews.title: Great pajamas
customer_reviews.text: Cute pajamas for grandpa for Christmas morning. Was a hit with the grandkids. Fit and washed well.
customer_reviews.author: Rose M.

customer_reviews.title: Pants are PERFECT- Shirts are SNUG
customer_reviews.text: My family loves these jams. The material is great and the pants are extremely comfortable. The shirts are very snug, though. They like to cling to everything!
customer_reviews.author: Howie + Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The sizes were way too small. My son is 11, so I ordered a 12 and it was still way too small. His pants also arrived with a hole in it. We weren't impressed with the quality at all.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and everyone’s fur well! Not sure how it will wash but it definitely served its purpose! Will be ordering again next year!
customer_reviews.author: Davone Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Ok item
customer_reviews.text: Material was thin. The child size 10 ran small. But it was ok. Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Christmas PJs
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids loved them. The only question was that the pattern was different for 2 small children than the older 4 children. I thought they were the same when ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Roy A. Brown III

customer_reviews.title: Family photo op
customer_reviews.text: Was a hit.. the baby size seemed to run a little small
customer_reviews.author: Robin Miller

customer_reviews.title: Sooo cool!
customer_reviews.text: We really like our Christmas matching pajamas. But the one who enjoys every night is my son. He wants to wear it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Think twice, sizes are way off.
customer_reviews.text: The tops are smaller than there suppose to be and the pants are larger. Very messed up deal.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: They run very small
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas run extremely small . I bought a size larger for my granddaughter . I washed them and hung them to dry . I did NOT put them in the dryer and she could only wear them once Christmas Eve because they were so tight. Very disappointed and felt a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: denise brophy

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These pjs were very disappointing. They were really thin and not a soft material. I ordered 5 pairs and not one of them fit properly. These were not worth it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Hunter

customer_reviews.title: The good and the bad
customer_reviews.text: The pjs are cute and fit as expected. One thing I dislike are the pants cuffs, they are very tight and I thought it was going to rip when I put the pjs on. They just arrived today, so hopefully they will still look bright and fit well after they are washed.
customer_reviews.author: Rashara Walker

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: The waist was super tight and the crotch was way too long. The top part of the pajamas fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Perry

customer_reviews.title: Little disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: It was nice but the one for my daughter the pants came broken..
customer_reviews.author: Juan M

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for me and my munchkin for Christmas this year and next, I sized hers up a few so we could get more than one use out of them hopefully. I love snowmen and she thought they were cute and represented her,mommy and daddy! :)
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Me and my family of five LOVED wearing these pajamas Christmas eve.
customer_reviews.author: K. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my husband around Christmas and he liked it and said it was very comfortable. It is cute and perfect for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Begum

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the family for Christmas 2019. Arrived just in time and fit great on all of us! Husband is 5’8” stocky build= Men’s XL/ I am 5’3” curvy= Women’s L/ daughter 5’3” slim/curvy= Women’s M/ Son#1 4’5” slim= youth 10/ Son#2 4’2” slim= youth 8.
customer_reviews.author: Hmmm...

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and don’t buy these.
customer_reviews.text: Pants are perfectly sized, but the shirts are way too small. Very cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia. B.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Used it for a photo shot with Santa hats and slippers. Got tons of likes on fb
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Size 8 fit great for my 8 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size 8 for my newly 8 year old son. Fits perfect, washed well, and so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: The material was perfect we all went a size bigger and the shirts fit perfect but the pants were too big. Wish the pants were true to size as the shirts. Overall the set was cute and perfect for Xmas.
customer_reviews.author: Unanimous

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty! Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fabric that made them. It fit snugly And the men’s size weren’t too tight. Colors looked bright and radiant. The helped to make my Christmas memorable!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Satisfied !
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size Mom Small but I received size Mom Medium. Very big. Order is not reliable. No attention to details from seller. Not recommended !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love these pj's
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these pjs. So soft and comfortable. Washed them in cold and hung them to dry because they are 100% cotton. Didn't want them shrinking on me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Brought for the whole family and the quality of these pajamas are amazing. Stretchy and very comfortable. I am usually a womens Large, and I ordered an XL, it fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Vw08417n

customer_reviews.title: really nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: great for the price but a bit too large for my kid but overall seems fine
customer_reviews.author: alexander clark

customer_reviews.title: Great family gift
customer_reviews.text: Everything fit I buy bigger it still fits and it’s more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable true to size
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas are light weight comfortable and true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: They fade fast and run small
customer_reviews.text: These run small for kids. I recommend ordering 1 size larger. The pajama bottoms faded excessively the first wash and the tops did not fade...
customer_reviews.author: Richard Pinter

customer_reviews.title: We are all g
customer_reviews.text: We are using our Christmas pajamas for Christmas Eve and Christmas morning. Each family are dressing alike. We all have not been together for several years. Planning on a great and blessed time.
customer_reviews.author: Mollygirl

customer_reviews.title: Pajamas were made and sold were below Amazon’s Standards.
customer_reviews.text: The pajamas I purchased were very poorly made as well as, cheaply made. The quality of the material that was used was below Amazon standards. I would not recommend the pajamas to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run small
customer_reviews.text: Sizes run 1 to 2 sizes small, nice and soft but very very thin. Don’t wash if you intend to wear one yime.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Brunson

customer_reviews.title: PJ didn't fit that good
customer_reviews.text: Shirts were short and the pants fit funny on the crotch. Felt really weird
customer_reviews.author: David K73

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my twin daughters and it fit them almost perfectly. They loved them and it made for great Christmas pajamas.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great family pajamas for all!
customer_reviews.text: Great Family pajamas and all the different sizes from Great Grandma to the grandkids fit!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and colorful
customer_reviews.text: I loved these matching pjs. Fit as expected, confy And cute
customer_reviews.author: Eridania Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Looked super cute on everyone. It's a little tight at the ankles but otherwise a really cute buy
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Good if you don't mind returning a few items.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return a few pieces since the sizes did not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pajamas
customer_reviews.text: We were very beautiful using the pajamas during Christmas night. My son loved it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Evangelista

customer_reviews.title: Run super small
customer_reviews.text: Fit is really small. I bought a size up and they were still tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Jammies
customer_reviews.text: They weren't all alike one pair of the womens was different looked almost the same colors different. Other that great
customer_reviews.author: lorne green

customer_reviews.title: We love these Christmas pajamas 😍☃️
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and cute ! My daughter really loves this pajamas and can’t wait for the Christmas to come 🎄 Fit as expected and really great quality! Very recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Pavel

customer_reviews.title: Design/Material
customer_reviews.text: They fit us perfectly, the material was just right and the design/colors were vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Tawana W.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and stretchy looked like they were gonna be small but fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Cute pj
customer_reviews.text: Cute great quality pajama with good print. Washed it in cold water and it looks the same as before washing.
customer_reviews.author: alex s.

customer_reviews.title: 100 x better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: These PJs are adorable!!! My husband, 13 month old and I all found the sizing and fit to be perfect. They are super comfortable and cute. Can’t wait to wear them for pics and Christmas Day fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Foster

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas fit good and are nicely made. Just had to buy them one size bigger than my kids size to make sure they fit and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: Fit is good
customer_reviews.text: Looks pink and my boys are 11, but the title of their shirts says baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for matching the family for Christmas and after.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my five grandchildren these for Christmas. They fit so well and looked so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Cawley

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait for the boys to wear these on Christmas Eve
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Bass

customer_reviews.title: Family That Matches
customer_reviews.text: Pants were big on all sizes but shirt fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Banks

customer_reviews.title: Cute but runs small
customer_reviews.text: Pants were a little short on my 8 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Ucfcutie

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but not as soft as I thought they would be
customer_reviews.author: kelly71

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Look so nice , but you have to order a larger size especially for children

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought mines would fit larger. I got an 1x.
customer_reviews.author: Me3

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great fit
customer_reviews.text: Family was dressed similar for Christmas eve. Pajamas were comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ot T.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable matching PJs
customer_reviews.text: After reading some reviews I found that people were suggesting to size up, so I sized up 1 size and the PJs fit perfectly on the kids. They’re cute and somewhat stretchy and the kids seem very comfy in them.
customer_reviews.author: litta015

customer_reviews.title: Soft material
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our Christmas holidays family trip. Good quality and soft cloth. I got the same for my 2 daughter and husband. For kids size order size up because it is skinny.
customer_reviews.author: Hominhy

product_meta.title: Family Matching Christmas Pajamas for Boys Girls Snowman Sleepwear Kids PJs Men Women 2 Pieces Pants Set
feature_bullets: For Whole Family:Comes in sizes for adults, boys and girls for a picture-perfect matching look during the Christmas holiday.

For Kids:100% Cotton,Snug fitted pajama set with long sleeves,tagless,crew neckline,ribbed knit cuffs, elastic waistband, and comfortable stretch.For your kids safety, the children pajama set is snug fitting.
For Women:Long sleeve 2 piece set,Lightweight knit crewneck top in a comfortable tagless design,ribbed knit cuffs,Printed knit legging pant with elastic waistband and ribbed knit cuffs.
For Men:Lightweight knit top in a comfortable tagless design,contrast crew neckline and relaxed fit, pants with elastic waistband,easy on/off.
NOTE:Must purchase each size individually; sale is only for one pair.Easy care,machine wash.Please choose one or two bigger size for your kids.
